N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 588.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Part
applies to any provider of service which is licensed to operate an outpatient
program for adults with a diagnosis of mental illness and children with a
diagnosis of emotional disturbance, in accordance with Part 587 of this

Title. (b) This Part applies to any
part of a general hospital as defined in article 28 of the Public Health Law
which is licensed to operate an outpatient program for adults with a diagnosis
of mental illness and children with a diagnosis of emotional disturbance, in
accordance with Part 587 of this Title. (c) This Part applies to a State-operated
psychiatric center which is licensed to operate an outpatient program for
adults with a diagnosis of mental illness and children with a diagnosis of
emotional disturbance, in accordance with Part 587 of this Title provided, however, that this Part does not apply to designated partial capitation
programs (e.g., pre-paid mental health programs). (d) This Part and all other standards of
reimbursement applicable to outpatient programs shall be effective contingent
upon Federal financial participation. Notes
